alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Northern Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 3:34PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gila and Navajo Counties through 400 PM MST... At 333 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles southeast of Young, or 26 miles northeast of Roosevelt, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Young. This includes State Route 288 between mile markers 288 and 298, near mile marker 301, and between mile markers 307 and 310. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mogollon Rim; Northern Gila County
